event.description: The number of cycles when the GPU has a workload of any type queued for processing
event.name: GPU active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when the GPU has a pending interrupt
event.name: GPU interrupt active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of jobs processed by the GPU fragment queue
event.name: Fragment jobs
event.title: Mali GPU Jobs

event.description: The number of fragment tasks processed
event.name: Fragment tasks
event.title: Mali GPU Tasks

event.description: The number of cycles when work is queued for processing in the GPU fragment queue
event.name: Fragment queue active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued fragment work is waiting for a descriptor load
event.name: Fragment queue descriptor read stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued fragment work is waiting for an available processor
event.name: Fragment queue job issue stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued fragment work is waiting for dependent work to complete
event.name: Fragment queue job dependency stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when the GPU is waiting for issued fragment work to complete
event.name: Fragment queue job finish stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of jobs processed by the GPU non-fragment queue
event.name: Non-fragment jobs
event.title: Mali GPU Jobs

event.description: The number of non-fragment tasks processed
event.name: Non-fragment tasks
event.title: Mali GPU Tasks

event.description: The number of cycles when work is queued in the GPU non-fragment queue
event.name: Non-fragment queue active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number number of cycles where queued non-fragment work is waiting for a descriptor load
event.name: Non-fragment queue descriptor read stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued non-fragment work is waiting for an available processor
event.name: Non-fragment queue job issue stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued non-fragment work is waiting for dependent work to complete
event.name: Non-fragment queue job dependency stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when the GPU is waiting for issued non-fragment work to complete
event.name: Non-fragment queue job finish stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of jobs processed by the GPU reserved queue
event.name: Reserved jobs
event.title: Mali GPU Jobs

event.description: The number of reserved tasks processed
event.name: Reserved tasks
event.title: Mali GPU Tasks

event.description: The number of cycles when work is queued in the GPU reserved queue
event.name: Reserved queue active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued reserved work is waiting for a descriptor load
event.name: Reserved queue descriptor read stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued reserved work is waiting for an available processor
event.name: Reserved queue job issue stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when queued reserved work is waiting for dependent work to complete
event.name: Reserved queue job dependency stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when the GPU is waiting for issued reserved work to complete
event.name: Reserved queue job finish stall
event.title: Mali GPU Wait Cycles

event.description: The number of level 2 translation table reads that hit in the main MMU TLB
event.name: L2 table read hits
event.title: Mali Stage 1 MMU Translations

event.description: The number of level 2 translation table reads
event.name: L2 table reads
event.title: Mali Stage 1 MMU Translations

event.description: The number of main MMU address translations performed
event.name: MMU lookups
event.title: Mali Stage 1 MMU Translations

event.description: The number of external bus data write cycles
event.name: Write beats
event.title: Mali External Bus Beats

event.description: The number of external bus data read cycles
event.name: Read beats
event.title: Mali External Bus Beats

event.description: The number of L2 cache lookups performed
event.name: Any lookups
event.title: Mali L2 Cache Lookups

event.description: The number of L2 cache read lookups performed
event.name: Read lookups
event.title: Mali L2 Cache Lookups

event.description: The number of L2 cache write lookups performed
event.name: Write lookups
event.title: Mali L2 Cache Lookups

event.description: The number of cycles when a read is stalled waiting for the external bus
event.name: Read stall
event.title: Mali External Bus Stall Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when a write is stalled waiting for the external bus
event.name: Write stall
event.title: Mali External Bus Stall Cycles

event.description: The number of cycles when the shader core is processing a fragment workload
event.name: Fragment active
event.title: Mali Shader Core Cycles

event.description: The number of primitives loaded from the tile list by the fragment front-end
event.name: Loaded primitives
event.title: Mali Fragment Primitives

event.description: The number of cycles when at least one quad is present in the pre-pipe quad queue
event.name: Fragment FPK buffer active
event.title: Mali Shader Core Cycles

event.description: The number of fragment threads started
event.name: Fragment threads
event.title: Mali Shader Threads

event.description: The number of fragment helper threads started
event.name: Fragment helper threads
event.title: Mali Shader Threads

event.description: The number of fine quads generated by the rasterization phase
event.name: Rasterized fine quads
event.title: Mali Fragment Quads

event.description: The number of quads that are undergoing early depth and stencil testing
event.name: Early ZS tested quads
event.title: Mali Fragment ZS Quads

event.description: The number of quads killed by early depth and stencil testing
event.name: Early ZS killed quads
event.title: Mali Fragment ZS Quads

event.name: Late ZS tested threads
event.title: Mali Shader Threads

event.description: The number of threads killed by late depth and stencil testing
event.name: Late ZS killed threads
event.title: Mali Shader Threads

event.description: The number of tiles processed by the shader core
event.name: Tiles
event.title: Mali Shader Core Tiles

event.description: The number of tiles killed by transaction elimination
event.name: Killed unchanged tiles
event.title: Mali Shader Core Tiles

event.description: The number of cycles when the shader core is processing some non-fragment workload
event.name: Non-fragment active
event.title: Mali Shader Core Cycles

event.description: The number of non-fragment threads started
event.name: Non-fragment threads
event.title: Mali Shader Threads

event.description: The number of cycles when the shader core is processing at least one warp
event.name: Execution core active
event.title: Mali Shader Core Cycles

event.description: The number of instructions run per warp
event.name: Executed instructions
event.title: Mali ALU Instructions

event.description: The total number of load/store issue cycles
event.name: Load/store unit issue
event.title: Mali Load/Store Unit Cycles

event.description: The number of thread-width texture operations processed
event.name: Texture requests
event.title: Mali Texture Unit Requests

event.description: The number of texture filtering issue cycles
event.name: Filtering active
event.title: Mali Texture Unit Cycles

event.description: The number of load/store reads that hit in the cache
event.name: Read hits

event.title: Mali Load/Store Unit Cycles

event.description: The number of load/store writes that hit in the cache
event.name: Write hits

event.description: The total number of load/store write cycles
event.name: Write
event.title: Mali Load/Store Unit Cycles

event.description: The number of load/store atomic accesses
event.name: Atomic access

event.name: Line primitives

event.name: Front-facing primitives

event.description: The number of back-facing triangles that are visible after culling
event.name: Back-facing primitives

event.description: The number of primitives that are visible after culling
event.name: Visible primitives
event.title: Mali Primitive Culling

event.description: The number of primitives that are culled by facing or frustum XY plane tests
event.name: Facing or XY plane test culled primitives
event.title: Mali Primitive Culling

event.description: The number of primitives that are culled by frustum Z plane tests
event.name: Z plane test culled primitives

event.description: The number of cycles when the tiler has a workload queued for processing
event.name: Tiler active
event.title: Mali GPU Cycles
